txt.en: 'Let us stay in the light, [placeholder]. I think that is best.'
Help clean off the encrusted object in front of Captain Lachír.
'What's that? More come. Ready yourself.'
'Yes, I. It can be only I who did this to them. Who led them here.'
DNT defended against assailants ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Put your shoulder into it, now.'
Wait with Captain Lachír for his men to return.
'Come!'
'Oh, what wonder, look!'
'How it shines with otherworldly light!'
'What was that? It must be my men returning. Still, we should be wary.'
'Hail. Who goes there?'
Talk to Captain Lachír while you wait for his men to return.
Something has come over Captain Lachír's men and they are attacking without regard.
'These were my men, [placeholder].'
There is a pause in the onslaught. Captain Lachír wishes to speak.
'My command. My charge.'
'If any remain unharmed, I must find them. I must stop this - this nightmare.'

When you meet Lachír's eyes in the light, there is a wildness behind a mask of bravery. It is fear.

'Have all my men turned on me? Can I have pushed them too far in search of something powerful, something truly magnificent? Can sullen resentment - or greed, greed and jealousy have driven them to such ends?

'But what am I saying? Did you see their faces? It was madness, madness and not mutiny written there, plain as day.'

The captain falls silent abruptly, brooding.
'Do not follow me. Find safety. Go!'
More of Captain Lachír's men are attacking.
Captain Lachír's men are attacking you!
DNT
Talk to Captain Lachír
Clean off the artifact
With an anguished cry, the captain runs off and is lost to the deepening shadows
You have found Captain Lachír. He, in turn, has found ingots of metal he believes are imbued with great power, and ordered his men to gather all they could find.
'Stop! What are you doing? I command you to lower your arms.'
'What... what is wrong with you? I am your captain!'
'Ah, and then there is this artifact! It is something else, entirely! It looks almost crusted over intentionally. Help me clear it off and we shall see what lies beneath.'
DNT 'Look, it shines with an otherworldly light'
'What fell sorcery has come over my men?'
'I cut him down... with these hands. Oh, darkest horror!'
'Ho now, is there anybody else out there? You must stop this at once!'
'What is this cursed darkness? It is cold - cold to my bones. It makes my skin crawl.'
DNT talk to the captain
Wait with Captain Lachír
'Gah! This darkness saps my strength. It withers my courage!'
TBD
'Gah! Have all my men turned on me? Tell me truly - it was only those who entered this place, was it not?'
Defend yourselves from Captain Lachír's men
'And why have they gone mad, but not I?'
'It is because they handled the iron, hour after hour, and not I.'
Talk to Captain Lachír
Instance: The Fatal Prize
Defend yourselves once more
DNT defended against assailant ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
